statements: UPDATE user_profiles SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET phone='+1234567890', social_media_handles='{"twitter": "johndoe", "instagram": "johndoe123"}' WHERE username='johndoe';
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='updated_email@example.com', phone='555-1234' WHERE id=100;
UPDATE user_profiles SET social_media_handles='{"twitter":"@example","instagram":"@example"}', username='updated_username' WHERE id=200;
UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name = 'Alice Smith', city = 'New York' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE social_media_handles SET handle = '@alice_smith' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' AND platform = 'Twitter';
UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name = 'John Doe', city = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 'c7a2d7ab-5729-492f-a196-a2e2973b1fcd';
UPDATE social_media_handles SET handle = '@john_doe123' WHERE user_id = 'c7a2d7ab-5729-492f-a196-a2e2973b1fcd' AND platform = 'Twitter';
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_handles SET handle = '@john_doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_handles SET platform = 'Twitter', handle = '@johndoe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 5;

UPDATE user_social_media SET platform='Twitter', handle='@johndoe' WHERE user_id=101
